lbOptSMTTable.name: lbOptSMTTable
lbOptSMTTable.description: A list of optional SMT entries. The number of entries shall not exceed the value of snmpFddiSMTNumber.

lbOptSMTEntry.name: lbOptSMTEntry
lbOptSMTEntry.description: An optional SMT entry containing information common to a given optional SMT.

lbOptSMTIndex.name: lbOptSMTIndex
lbOptSMTIndex.description: A unique value for each SMT. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of snmpFddiSMTNumber. The value for each SMT must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of the entity's network management system to the next re-initialization.

lbOptSMTManufacturerOUI.name: lbOptSMTManufacturerOUI
lbOptSMTManufacturerOUI.description: The three octets of manufacturer data which make up the manufacturerOUI component.

lbOptSMTManufacturerData.name: lbOptSMTManufacturerData
lbOptSMTManufacturerData.description: The 29 octets of manufacturer data which make up the manufacturerData component.

lbOptSMTHoldState.name: lbOptSMTHoldState
lbOptSMTHoldState.description: This variable indicates the current state of the Hold function. The value 'not-holding' is the default and initial value. The value must be set to 'not-holding' as part of Active_Actions and when the conditions causing 'holding-prm' or 'holding-sec' are no longer true. The value 'holding-prm' must be set when the condition (notTR_Flag & not RE_Flag & (PC_LS=QLS | LEM_Fail | TNE>NS_Max | (not LS_Flag & TPC > T_Out))) is satisfied in state PC8:ACTIVE for the A Port. The value 'holding-sec' must be set when the condition (notTR_Flag & not RE_Flag & (PC_LS=QLS | LEM_Fail | TNE>NS_Max | (not LS_Flag & TPC > T_Out))) is satisfied in state PC8:ACTIVE for the B Port.

lbOptSMTSetCount.name: lbOptSMTSetCount
lbOptSMTSetCount.description: This variable is composed of a count incremented in response to a Set operation on the MIB, and the time of the change, however only the count is reported here (refer to ANSI SMT 8.4.1).

lbOptSMTLastSetStationId.name: lbOptSMTLastSetStationId
lbOptSMTLastSetStationId.description: The Station ID of the station that effected the last change in the FDDI MIB.

lbOptMACBridgeFunctionTable.name: lbOptMACBridgeFunctionTable
lbOptMACBridgeFunctionTable.description: A list of MAC bridge function entries.

lbOptMACBridgeFunctionEntry.name: lbOptMACBridgeFunctionEntry
lbOptMACBridgeFunctionEntry.description: Bridge function information for a given MAC within a given SMT.

lbOptMACBridgeFunctionSMTIndex.name: lbOptMACBridgeFunctionSMTIndex
lbOptMACBridgeFunctionSMTIndex.description: A unique value for each SMT. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of snmpFddiSMTNumber. The value for each SMT must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of the entity's network management system to the next re-initialization.

lbOptMACBridgeFunctionMACIndex.name: lbOptMACBridgeFunctionMACIndex
lbOptMACBridgeFunctionMACIndex.description: Index variable for uniquely identifying the MAC object instances.

lbOptMACBridgeFunctions.name: lbOptMACBridgeFunctions
lbOptMACBridgeFunctions.description: Indicates the MAC's optional bridging functions. The Value -1 is used to indicate that bridging is not supported by this MAC. The value is a sum. This value initially takes the value zero, then for each function present, 2 raised to a power is added to the sum. The powers are according to the following table: Function Power tb 0 -- Transparent bridging active sr 1 -- Src routing active srt 2 -- Src routing transparent active

lbOptMACTPriTable.name: lbOptMACTPriTable
lbOptMACTPriTable.description: A list of MAC T-Pri entries.

lbOptMACTPriEntry.name: lbOptMACTPriEntry
lbOptMACTPriEntry.description: A collection of T-Pri information for a given MAC within a given SMT.

lbOptMACTPriSMTIndex.name: lbOptMACTPriSMTIndex
lbOptMACTPriSMTIndex.description: A unique value for each SMT. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of snmpFddiSMTNumber. The value for each SMT must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of the entity's network management system to the next re-initialization.

lbOptMACTPriMACIndex.name: lbOptMACTPriMACIndex
lbOptMACTPriMACIndex.description: Index variable for uniquely identifying the MAC object instances.

lbOptMACTPri0.name: lbOptMACTPri0
lbOptMACTPri0.description: This attribute is an unsigned twos-complement T_pri threshold as described in the MAC standard converted to non-twos-complement form and reported in 1 ns units.

lbOptMACTPri1.name: lbOptMACTPri1
lbOptMACTPri1.description: This attribute is an unsigned twos-complement T_pri threshold as described in the MAC standard converted to non-twos-complement form and reported in 1 ns units.

lbOptMACTPri2.name: lbOptMACTPri2
lbOptMACTPri2.description: This attribute is an unsigned twos-complement T_pri threshold as described in the MAC standard converted to non-twos-complement form and reported in 1 ns units.

lbOptMACTPri3.name: lbOptMACTPri3
lbOptMACTPri3.description: This attribute is an unsigned twos-complement T_pri threshold as described in the MAC standard converted to non-twos-complement form and reported in 1 ns units.

lbOptMACTPri4.name: lbOptMACTPri4
lbOptMACTPri4.description: This attribute is an unsigned twos-complement T_pri threshold as described in the MAC standard converted to non-twos-complement form and reported in 1 ns units.

lbOptMACTPri5.name: lbOptMACTPri5
lbOptMACTPri5.description: This attribute is an unsigned twos-complement T_pri threshold as described in the MAC standard converted to non-twos-complement form and reported in 1 ns units.

lbOptMACTPri6.name: lbOptMACTPri6
lbOptMACTPri6.description: This attribute is an unsigned twos-complement T_pri threshold as described in the MAC standard converted to non-twos-complement form and reported in 1 ns units.

lbOptPATHRingTable.name: lbOptPATHRingTable
lbOptPATHRingTable.description: A list of PATH ring entries.

lbOptPATHRingEntry.name: lbOptPATHRingEntry
lbOptPATHRingEntry.description: Ring latency, trace status, and T-Rmode information for a given PATH within a given SMT.

lbOptPATHRingSMTIndex.name: lbOptPATHRingSMTIndex
lbOptPATHRingSMTIndex.description: A unique value for each SMT. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of snmpFddiSMTNumber. The value for each SMT must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of the entity's network management system to the next re-initialization.

lbOptPATHRingPATHIndex.name: lbOptPATHRingPATHIndex
lbOptPATHRingPATHIndex.description: Index variable for uniquely identifying the primary, secondary and local PATH object instances. Local PATH object instances are represented with integer values 3 to 255.

lbOptPATHRingLatency.name: lbOptPATHRingLatency
lbOptPATHRingLatency.description: Gives the total accumulated latency of the ring associated with this path. May be measured directly by the station or calculated by a management station. Values of this object are reported in 1 ns units.

lbOptPATHTraceStatus.name: lbOptPATHTraceStatus
lbOptPATHTraceStatus.description: This attribute indicates the current trace status of the path. The value is a sum which represents all of the trace status information which applies. This value initially takes the value zero, then for each condition which applies, 2 raised to a power is added to the sum. the powers are according to the following table: TraceStatus Power traceinitiated 0 tracepropragated 1 traceterminated 2 tracetimeout 3

lbOptPATHT_Rmode.name: lbOptPATHT_Rmode
lbOptPATHT_Rmode.description: Used by RMT to limit the duration of restricted dialogs on a path. This object is reported in 1 ns units.

lbOptPATHSbaTable.name: lbOptPATHSbaTable
lbOptPATHSbaTable.description: A list of PATH Sba entries.

lbOptPATHSbaEntry.name: lbOptPATHSbaEntry
lbOptPATHSbaEntry.description: Sba information for a given PATH within a given SMT.

lbOptPATHSbaSMTIndex.name: lbOptPATHSbaSMTIndex
lbOptPATHSbaSMTIndex.description: A unique value for each SMT. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of snmpFddiSMTNumber. The value for each SMT must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of the entity's network management system to the next re-initialization.

lbOptPATHSbaPATHIndex.name: lbOptPATHSbaPATHIndex
lbOptPATHSbaPATHIndex.description: Index variable for uniquely identifying the primary, secondary and local PATH object instances. Local PATH object instances are represented with integer values 3 to 255.

lbOptPATHSbaPayload.name: lbOptPATHSbaPayload
lbOptPATHSbaPayload.description: The payload portion of the Synchronous Bandwidth Allocation for thi path. This value represents the maximum number of bytes of data allocated for transmission per 125 microseconds.

lbOptPATHSbaOverhead.name: lbOptPATHSbaOverhead
lbOptPATHSbaOverhead.description: The overhead portion of the Synchronous Bandwith Allocation for this path. This value repersents the maximum number of bytes overhead (token capture, frame header, etc.) used pre negotiated Target Token Rotation Time (T_neg).

lbOptPATHSbaAvailable.name: lbOptPATHSbaAvailable
lbOptPATHSbaAvailable.description: This value is the maximum Synchronous Bandwith available for a path in bytes per second.

lbOptPORTTable.name: lbOptPORTTable
lbOptPORTTable.description: A list of optional PORT entries.

lbOptPORTEntry.name: lbOptPORTEntry
lbOptPORTEntry.description: MAC loop time and EB error count information for a given PORT within a given SMT.

lbOptPORTSMTIndex.name: lbOptPORTSMTIndex
lbOptPORTSMTIndex.description: A unique value for each SMT. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of snmpFddiSMTNumber. The value for each SMT must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of the entity's network management system to the next re-initialization.

lbOptPORTIndex.name: lbOptPORTIndex
lbOptPORTIndex.description: Index variable for uniquely identifying the PORT object instances.

lbOptPORTMACLoopTime.name: lbOptPORTMACLoopTime
lbOptPORTMACLoopTime.description: This attribute controls the value used for T_Next(9) (see 9.4.4.2.3). This object is reported in 1 ns units.

lbOptPORTEBErrorCt.name: lbOptPORTEBErrorCt
lbOptPORTEBErrorCt.description: A count that should as closely as possible match the times an Elasticity Buffer Error has occurred while in active line state.

lbOptPORTLSTable.name: lbOptPORTLSTable
lbOptPORTLSTable.description: A list of optional PORT line state entries.

lbOptPORTLSEntry.name: lbOptPORTLSEntry
lbOptPORTLSEntry.description: Maintenance line state and PC line state information for a given PORT within a given SMT.

lbOptPORTLSSMTIndex.name: lbOptPORTLSSMTIndex
lbOptPORTLSSMTIndex.description: A unique value for each SMT. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of snmpFddiSMTNumber. The value for each SMT must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of the entity's network management system to the next re-initialization.

lbOptPORTLSPORTIndex.name: lbOptPORTLSPORTIndex
lbOptPORTLSPORTIndex.description: Index variable for uniquely identifying the PORT object instances.

lbOptPORTMaintLS.name: lbOptPORTMaintLS
lbOptPORTMaintLS.description: The PORT Maintenance Line State specifies the line state (Maint_LS) to be transmitted when the PCM state machine for the port is in state PC9 Maint.

lbOptPORTPCLS.name: lbOptPORTPCLS
lbOptPORTPCLS.description: This attribute indicates the line state (PC_LS) received by the port.

lbOptSMTHoldCondition.name: lbOptSMTHoldCondition
lbOptSMTHoldCondition.description: Generated when fddiSMTHoldState (fddimibSMTHoldState) assumes the state holding-prm or holding-sec. This notification is a Condition in the Status Report Protocol (see 7.2.7 and 8.3).

lbOptSMTPeerWrapCondition.name: lbOptSMTPeerWrapCondition
lbOptSMTPeerWrapCondition.description: This condition is active when fddiSMTPeerWrapFlag (fddimibSMTPeerWrapFlag) is set. This notification is a Condition in the Status Report Protocol (see 7.2.7 and 8.3).

lbOptMACDuplicateAddressCondition.name: lbOptMACDuplicateAddressCondition
lbOptMACDuplicateAddressCondition.description: This condition is active when either fddiMACDA-Flag (fddimibMACDaFlag) or fddiMACUNDA-Flag (fddimibMACUnaDaFlag) is set. This event is handled as a Condition in the Status Report Protocol (see 7.2.7 and 8.3).

lbOptMACFrameErrorCondition.name: lbOptMACFrameErrorCondition
lbOptMACFrameErrorCondition.description: Generated when the fddiMACFrameErrorRatio (fddimibMACFrameErrorRatio) is greater than or equal to fddiMACFrameErrorThreshold (fddimibMACFrameErrorThreshold). This event is handled as a Condition in the Status Report Protocol (see 7.2.7 and 8.3).

lbOptMACNotCopiedCondition.name: lbOptMACNotCopiedCondition
lbOptMACNotCopiedCondition.description: Generated when the fddiMACNotCopiedRatio (fddimibMACNotCopiedRatio) is greater than or equal to the fddiMACNotCopiedThreshold (lbOptMACNotCopiedThreshold). This event is handled as a Condition in the Status Report Protocol (see 7.2.7 and 8.3).

lbOptMACNeighborChangeEvent.name: lbOptMACNeighborChangeEvent
lbOptMACNeighborChangeEvent.description: Generated when a change in a MAC's upstream neighbor address or downstream neighbor address is detected. (see 7.2.7 and 8.3).

lbOptMACPathChangeEvent.name: lbOptMACPathChangeEvent
lbOptMACPathChangeEvent.description: This event is generated when the value of the fddiMACCurrentPath (fddimibMACCurrentPath) changes. This event shall be supressed if the value changes from isolated to local or local to isolated (see 7.2.7 and 8.3).

lbOptPORTLerCondition.name: lbOptPORTLerCondition
lbOptPORTLerCondition.description: This condition becomes active when the value of fddiPORTLer-Estimate (fddimibPORTLerEstimate) is less than or equal to fddiPORTLer-Alarm (fddimibPORTLerAlarm). This will be reported with the Status Report Frames (SRF) (see 7.2.7 and 8.3).

lbOptPORTUndesiredConnAttemptEvent.name: lbOptPORTUndesiredConnAttemptEvent
lbOptPORTUndesiredConnAttemptEvent.description: Generated when an undesired connection attempt has been made (see 5.2.4, 7.2.7, and 8.3).

lbOptPORTEBErrorCondition.name: lbOptPORTEBErrorCondition
lbOptPORTEBErrorCondition.description: Generated when the Elasticity Buffer Error-Ct (lbOptPORTEBErrorCt) increments. This is handled as a condition in the Status Report Protocol. It is generated when an increment occurs in the station's sampling period (see 7.2.7 and 8.3).

lbOptPORTPathChangeEvent.name: lbOptPORTPathChangeEvent
lbOptPORTPathChangeEvent.description: This event is generated when the value of the fddiPORTCurrentPath (lbOptPORTCurrentPath) changes. This event shall be surpressed if the value changes from isolated to local or local to isolated (see 7.2.7 and 8.3).
